00020  * This function return a factor to calcul moving with time
00021  */
00022 inline float get_time_interval(int fps)
00023 {
00024   
00025   if(!fps)return 0;
00026   return 1000.0/((float)fps);
00027   
00028 }

00057 void GameEngine::run()
00058 {
00059   set_state_ingame();
00060 
00061   CommonResources *resources = common_resources_get_instance();
00062   resources -> player1.new_game();
00063 
00064   running = true;
00065    
00066   while (running)
00067   {
00068     common_state.events();
00069     common_state.update();
00070     common_state.draw();
00071 
00072     GameState* current_state = states_stack.top();
00073     current_state -> events();
00074     current_state -> update();
00075     current_state -> draw();
00076 
00077     //draw_game();
00078     //key_events(); 
00079 
00080     // Get the Framerate
00081     resources -> fps = fps_getter.get_fps();
00082     resources -> time_interval = get_time_interval(resources->fps);
00083 
00084 
00085     CL_Display::flip();
00086 
00087     // This call updates input and performs other "housekeeping"
00088     // Call this each frame
00089     // Also, gives the CPU a rest for 10 milliseconds to catch up
00090     CL_System::keep_alive();
00091   }
00092 }

00153 void GameEngine::toggle_screen()
00154 {
00155   Preferences *pref = pref_get_instance();
00156   pref -> fullscreen = !pref -> fullscreen;
00157   if(pref -> fullscreen)
00158   {
00159     window->set_fullscreen(800,600,0,0);
00160     CL_Mouse::hide();

00163   {
